content.rendered:
Directed by Sriram Adittya.

Written by Sriram Adittya. Venkat D. Pati. Bhupati Raja.

Cast Nagarjuna Akkineni(Deva). Nani(Das). Aakanksha Singh(Jahnavi). Rashmika Mandanna(Pooja). S.P. Balasubrahmanyam(Dr. Seetharamayya). Kunal Kapoor(David). V.K. Naresh(Mohan). Srinivas Avasarala(Rajan). Naveen Chandra(Ajay). Rao Ramesh(Dr. Bharadwaj). Vennela Kishore(Dr. Kuchipudi). Murli Sharma(Officer Sharma). Prabhakar(Rascal). Satya(Jacky) .Mahesh Achanta.Aditya Alluri.Sampoornesh Babu. Tammareddy Bharadwaja(SI Narayana (as Bharadwaja Thammareddy)). Aishwariyaa Bhaskaran(Lakshmi (as Aishwarya)).Vasu Bhavirisetti.M.S. Chowdary. Cricknowle(Akhilesh). Raghu Kumar Karumanchi(Dhoolpet Durga).Mahesh Kathi.Khaleel. Prem Khan(Junior Das).Mirchi Kiran.Satya Krishnan.Sri Madhavi Kuchibhotla. Manobala(Tata Rao). Mukesh Marko(Babalu). Al Yasaha Naim(Al Yasaha).J.D.V. Prasad.Ram Prasad.Prudhviraj.Ragini.Rising Raju.Sameer. R. Sarathkumar(Dada (as Sarath Kumar)).Sivannarayana.Prabhas Sreenu.Viren Thambidorai.Venu Tillu. Uttej(Raju)

Language Telugu.

Producers Sahni Bob. C. Aswani Dutt.

Production Viacom18 Motion Pictures. Vyjayanthi Movies.
